doc.after: Since the creation of the EU in 1993 it has developed its competencies in the area of freedom security and justice initially at an intergovernmental level and later by supranationalism To this end agencies have been established that co ordinate associated actions Europol for co operation of police forces 114 Eurojust for co operation between prosecutors 115 and Frontex for co operation between border control authorities 116 The EU also operates the Schengen Information System 17 which provides a common database for police and immigration authorities This co operation had to particularly be developed with the advent of open borders through the Schengen Agreement and the associated cross border crime
